text: Haji Syed Hussain (born Quetta, Balochistan, Pakistan, Died Quetta 9 August 2002) was a Pakistani politician. He belonged to the Hazara people. He was member of Majlis al Shura of Pakistan in Zia-ul-Haq's era. His son Syed Nasir Ali Shah is Ex-Member of National Assembly from NA-259.He was a Pakistani Senator in period of 1973 till 1975 and from 1975 till 1977.He was member of National Awami Party (Wali). He was the president of Balochistan Shia Conference.His two books which were published before his death are Mashal e Hidayath ( Lantern of Guidance) and Bey-Pardagi and Bey-Hayayi Door E Hazir mai.
